import React, { useState}/*, useEffect } */from 'react'; import { Button, Form, Grid, Input, TextArea, Card,Modal, Header,Table, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Productselect from './ListaProductoDevolucion' function DevolucionProducto() { const [productos/*, setProductos*/] = useState([ { id: "hola", stock: 5, name: 'Arduino' }, { id: 1, stock: 7, name: 'Impresora' }, { id: 2, stock: 12, name: 'Sensor Ultrasonido' }, { id: 3, stock: 32, name: 'Led Rojo' }, { id: 4, stock: 50, name: 'Resistencias' }, { id: 37, stock: 50, name: 'Resistencias' }, { id: 27, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 74, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 72, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 78, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 71, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 17, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 47, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 57, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 51, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 79, stock: 50, name: 'Prueba' }, { id: 8, stock: 50, name: 'Resistencias' }, { id: 9, stock: 10, name: 'Protoboard' }]); const [isShowing, setIsShowing] = useState(false); const [encargado, setEncargado] = useState(""); const [descripcion, setDescripcion] = useState(""); const [file, setFile] = useState(''); const [nameFile, setNameFile] = useState(''); const fileInputRef = React.createRef(); const getFile = e => { setFile(e.target.files[0]) setNameFile(e.target.files[0].name) } const handleSubmit = (evt) => { alert(encargado+descripcion+file) } return ( {/* Inicio modal */} < Modal onClose={e => setIsShowing(!isShowing)} trigger={< Button fluid color="youtube" > Lista de Productos} size="small" > Devolucion Producto
Lista de Productos
Producto Articulos Pendientes Cantidad Seleccionar {productos.map((producto, index) => { const { stock, name, id } = producto return ( ) })}
{/* Fin modal */} setEncargado(e.target.value)} />
